lines.text:
[On the phone]
Look! I know what you're doing and I want out! This is out of my league! You have to get somebody else. Huh? Don't dirt me you cheap piece of dirt! I don't care what you do to me! What? You... you wouldn't!
Hey call a cop, lady! I'm outta here!

[to Carol]
Come on! We gotta get out of here!
It's a set up! I mean, I think... I'll explain later! I set you up! Now come on! We gotta get out! There's no time!
[Delvaux is run over by Carson, the hitman]

[his only line]
You think she'll show?
Lynn liked what she did - she was the best, and the most expensive.
We have reasons to believe your sister is dead.
Sophie, how do you do this?
